description: Exclusive individual villa in one of the best areas of Meco, with large avenues and free spaces, built in 2022. This chalet is made up of 2 floors with top quality finishes. The FIRST FLOOR consists of a bright hall open to the 50-meter living-dining room with 7-meter-high ceilings, a modern and furnished kitchen, a boiler room and an impressive suite-type guest bedroom with a dressing room and a full bathroom. Both the living room and the kitchen have direct access to the garden, with parallel tilting PVC windows with three panes to avoid both the cold and the heat. Its large format floors and white lacquered doors, as well as all smooth walls and high ceilings, give a great feeling of spaciousness and comfort. On the SECOND FLOOR with an open floor, where all the light flows through the house, expanding the spaces and giving a touch of class, we find 2 large bedrooms with a bathroom in each one and the fabulous master bedroom, composed of a wonderful dressing room and a bathroom where a shower and bathtub are integrated for moments of relaxation. Aerothermal heating with cooling floor throughout the house in addition to solar panels, or KNX home automation turn this home into a smart home to make our daily lives comfortable. Its exclusive touches with Iroko wooden stairs, as well as its natural garden with automatic irrigation, without forgetting its saltwater pool, its video surveillance system or its garage for 2 vehicles, make this exclusive and luxury home a place comfortable and warm for the whole family. DON'T HESITATE AND VISIT IT! A salesperson will accompany you on your visit, informing you of every detail.

We are in the town of Meco, one of the most rising towns in the community of Madrid due to its privileged location, we can enjoy the peace and tranquility of a town while having all the services and unbeatable access to the capital through the R2; Today we are going to see a property built in 2008, very well maintained and bright. Firstly, it should be noted that we are faced with an independent villa of 227 m² built on a plot of 601 m² with the possibility of building a private pool. Accessing the house through the main door we find the hall/distributor, from which, On the right hand side we will find a large fully furnished kitchen from where we can access the dining room through a sliding door. Returning to the hall, we will find on the left the access to the garage from inside the house, as well as a storage room. If we continue advancing we will find a very large living room, very bright as it has windows in different orientations, and which has communication with the dining room, making the social part of this home offer us many possibilities; It also has a built-in pellet boiler and hot air outlet installation in all rooms.Finally, we have a guest room with a full bathroom with a bathtub. Through the stairs we will access the upper floor where we will find a distributor to the 3 bedrooms, being very spacious and bright, especially the master bedroom, which also has an en-suite bathroom with a bathtub; Finally, back in the hall we will find a complete bathroom with a shower tray. It should be noted that all the walls are smooth, the windows have thermal breaks, we have hot air outlets from the boiler in all rooms, as well as air conditioning in all bedrooms and the living room. If we stand on the plot, we will find on the left the garage, - which as we already mentioned has access to the house - consists of an electric lift gate, as well as the carriage access, which was renovated by removing the swing doors and installing a sliding door. Electric with safety photocell.To the left of the garage, we also have a garage with enough space for up to 5 vehicles.Surrounding the house we will find a large, bright and sunny plot, except for some flower beds. Combining the IPZ, PROPERTY, PRICE AND AREA we find a spacious and well-kept property with 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, separate living room and dining room, garage with access to the property and a large plot, located in the best and most recent area of the town As for the price, we are talking about a property with a price very consistent with the area and the available meters. Regarding the area, it should be noted that it is located in the best area of the town, with schools, supermarkets, less than 3 minutes away. bus stops and everything you need to have a comfortable and quiet life. If you are thinking of buying a spacious and bright house in Meco (Madrid), Grupo Amboss, your real estate boutique in the community of Madrid, offers you the possibility of visiting this property accompanied by the best professionals.

SPECTACULAR independent villa in the best area of Meco. This architectural marvel consists of two floors, each divided into sub-floors, with high ceilings and a small inclination of the same that provide an expanded perspective of all the rooms. The large windows allow wonderful natural light to flow throughout the house, in addition to having an Efficiency A in all rooms due to its double glazed double glazing, each part measuring 6 millimeters. In addition, it has a very well-kept plot that has a private pool, shower at the foot of the pool and automatic irrigation. The chalet is distributed as follows: *GROUND FLOOR: With a spacious, bright hall, with a built-in wardrobe and lined with French oak wooden doors, leading to an individual living room that has a living and dining area, from the living room it exits to a closed porch where there is a of two environments to be able to enjoy both summer and winter. A kitchen from where you also access the plot with a separate laundry room and a marble and porcelain guest toilet. On the sub-floor or below ground level there is a garage with capacity for 2 vehicles, a room perfect for an office and a pantry. *FIRST FLOOR: Suite-type master bedroom with full marble bathroom, a large-capacity 6-piece coated wardrobe, a double bedroom with a 2-piece built-in wardrobe. Both bedrooms come out of a large hallway where another large 4-section closet is located. On the sub-floor or below deck we have another full bathroom with a shower and a double bedroom with a built-in wardrobe. The entire ground floor has gates for greater security, smooth walls and high ceilings, wooden floors and marble stairs, as well as photovoltaic panels for a good conversion of thermal energy into electricity. Don't miss the opportunity and come see this unique and wonderful home!

Avenida 21, Madrid real estate agency, EXCLUSIVELY offers for sale this semi-detached detached house, completely renovated and located in the Madrid town of Meco. The chalet is divided into two floors and has 212 m² built. We enter the property and find a small garden and a parking area with capacity for three vehicles. Upon entering the house we find a hall that distributes the different rooms. On the ground floor we find the living room with large windows that give us a lot of light, an office room, a guest room, a master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom as well as another fully equipped bathroom. All bedrooms have built-in wardrobes, dressing rooms and very good ability. Fully equipped kitchen with top brand appliances and with a door that gives us direct access to the garden area, about 70m2, where we find a terrace area with an awning, an outdoor furniture and storage shed, where we can enjoy this space. outdoor. On the upper floor we find an open-plan room of 73 m2, large windows, with another room and another large full bathroom with lots of light. This villa has all the comforts such as video intercom at the entrance, split air conditioning with heat pump, natural gas heating, armored security door, motorized door for car entry, beautiful Mallorcan shutters and alarm. In short, it is a semi-detached house that consists of four bedrooms, three complete bathrooms, one of them en suite. Renovated with great style, it provides us with comfort and warmth, which makes this house our home, located in a very quiet and residential place in Meco. DESCRIPTION OF THE AREA: Meco is in Madrid's Alcarria, very close to Alcalá de Henares.Its good communications and its extensive infrastructure network make this municipality a place to reside that is increasingly chosen by young people, which makes it one of the towns with the lowest average age in the entire Community. Its surroundings are part of the Special Protection Area for Birds of the Henares and Jarama rivers and also of the Cañada Real Galiana.This privileged location makes Meco part of numerous hiking routes. Its old town is very well preserved and along its main streets you can see stately homes and baroque mansions.But its main example of artistic heritage is the church of Nuestra Señora de la Asunción from the 16th century, declared a Historical Artistic Monument and Asset of Cultural Interest of the Community of Madrid.A mixture of Gothic and Baroque styles, its interior houses a valuable altarpiece that represents the Assumption of the Virgin. Meco is located about 35 km from Madrid capital and 10 from the center of Alcalá de Henares.It has a Cercanías Madrid stop station belonging to line C-2, located 2 km from the town centre.One exit to the Radial Highway 2 and two exits on roads other than the A2 (M-116 and M-121). 3 bus lines also stop in the municipality, two of them with their head at the Avenida de América Interchange.All lines are from ALSA.
